qas.question: What year was the island evacuated due to an eruption?
What year did most families return after being evacuated?
What was the name of the settlement that was assessed after the evactuation?
When was the population of England forced to Cape Town?
Which eruption caused the population of Royal Society to evacuate to England?
What returned to the island by 1961?
By when had most families left the islands?
Which settlement had been devastatingly affected?

context: The <a0_0><b3_0>1961<b3_0/><a0_0/> eruption of <b4_0>Queen Mary's Peak<b4_0/> forced the evacuation of the entire population via Cape Town to England. The following year a Royal Society expedition went to the islands to assess the damage, and reported that the settlement of <a2_0><b7_0>Edinburgh of the Seven Seas<b7_0/><a2_0/> had been only marginally affected. <b5_0>Most families<b5_0/> returned in <a1_0><b6_0>1963<b6_0/><a1_0/>.
